message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY 

The paper deals with the problem of detecting curvy lanes and curves for driving assistance and autonomous vehicles. This falls under the domain of computer vision (cs.CV) and robotics (cs.RO). The paper proposes an algorithm for detecting curves with desired slopes, which involves machine learning techniques (cs.AI) and statistical analysis (cs.LG). The aim of the algorithm is to develop a robust method for detecting curves even in adverse conditions, which involves system control (cs.SY). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, and cs.SY.
